GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-37N 007-07E AT 070436Z APR.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   TELEX: MA 34199, PHONE: 603 2031 0014,

   AND MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1132/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 140831Z APR 18.
